an1.333-377:4.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ imasmiṃ jambudīpe ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
an1.333-377:4.2: atha kho etadeva bahutaraṃ yadidaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ nadīviduggaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ;
an1.333-377:4.3: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye thalajā, atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye odakā.
an1.333-377:6.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:6.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:7.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:7.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti aviññātāresu milakkhesu.
an1.333-377:9.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye paññavanto ajaḷā aneḷamūgā paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ;
an1.333-377:9.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye duppaññā jaḷā eḷamūgā na paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
an1.333-377:11.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye ariyena paññācakkhunā samannāgatā;
an1.333-377:11.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye avijjāgatā sammūḷhā.
an1.333-377:13.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye labhanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya;
an1.333-377:13.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye na labhanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya.
an1.333-377:15.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye labhanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya;
an1.333-377:15.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye na labhanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya.
an1.333-377:17.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye sutvā dhammaṃ dhārenti;
an1.333-377:17.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye sutvā dhammaṃ na dhārenti.
an1.333-377:19.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhanti;
an1.333-377:19.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti.
an1.333-377:21.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjanti;
an1.333-377:21.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ na paṭipajjanti.
an1.333-377:23.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye saṃvejaniyesu ṭhānesu saṃvijjanti;
an1.333-377:23.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye saṃvejaniyesu ṭhānesu na saṃvijjanti.
an1.333-377:25.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye saṃviggā yoniso padahanti;
an1.333-377:25.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye saṃviggā yoniso na padahanti.
an1.333-377:27.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye vavassaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā labhanti samādhiṃ labhanti cittassekaggataṃ;
an1.333-377:27.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye vavassaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā na labhanti samādhiṃ na labhanti cittassekaggataṃ.
an1.333-377:29.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye annaggarasaggānaṃ lābhino;
an1.333-377:29.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye annaggarasaggānaṃ na lābhino, uñchena kapālābhatena yāpenti.
an1.333-377:31.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa lābhino;
an1.333-377:31.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa na lābhino.
an1.333-377:33.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ imasmiṃ jambudīpe ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
an1.333-377:33.2: atha kho etadeva bahutaraṃ yadidaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ nadīviduggaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ.
an1.333-377:33.3: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti, atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … pe … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pe … pettivisaye paccājāyanti”.
an1.333-377:35.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:35.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:37.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:37.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:39.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:39.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:41.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye nirayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:41.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:43.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye nirayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:43.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:45.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:45.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:47.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:47.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:49.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:49.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:51.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:51.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyan”ti.
